articles.description:
RT camiinthisthang.eth | Graph Day 👽🛸
Last nights @graphprotocol hack prep felt like the culmination of everything I’ve worked towards 🥹🥹
Seeing a room full of Black & Latino Bay Area natives in the same room as my web3 friends, both there to learn, was everything  💟
@developer_dao 🤝 locals 🤝 @AtlasCafe_SF

here's a better list:

Sp Thx to @davidesilverman & @brad_or_bradley for making this happen!
It’s buidl time
